string.value: Dalphs#b#9220005##k in Happyville has a favor to ask of you.
You met with Dalphs#b#p9220005##k in Happyville. He asked if you could bring a glass of warm milk to #bIcarus in Kerning City#.\n\n#t4031884# #b#c4031884##k/1
You delivered a glass of warm milk to Icarus#b#p1010100##k in Kerning City.

Oh, poor Icarus still can't fall asleep during the Christmas season? Hmm, I really hope Santa Claus doesn't pass over his house again. For the past few years, Santa Claus wanted to give him some gifts, but he had to skip his house because Icarus was still awake! How can we help him this year? Oh, yes! I heard that a glass of warm milk will help him sleep like a baby!
So, will it be possible for you to deliver a glass of warm milk to Icarus on my behalf?

Thanks! That's very kind of you. I'm sure Icarus will get a present from Santa Claus with your help. And your kindness will not go unrewarded either, I'm sure! Icarus is in Kerning City; you should be able to purchase a glass of warm milk from the store there. Please deliver that to Icarus before it gets cold!
Ah, I guess you are too busy to do a small favor for the good of Maple World! I'll have to find somebody else then!
Ah, I can't go to bed! I'm not sleepy at all! I really hope I can fall asleep early this Christmas.
Have you not met with #b#p1052106##k yet? You better hurry up and deliver the milk.
